entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Decorating functions with UnmanagedCallersOnlyAttribute does not export them for executables #78663
  • Generic math WriteLittleEndian is slow #78662
  • TypeLoadException in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml v7.0.0.0 for EncryptedData in .NET 4.8 project referencing .NET Standard 2.0 library #78652
  • `AssemblyLoadContext` load multiple assemblies with same name #78649
  • Casting via generic math doesn't always inline as expected #78648
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT always produced warning about including the NuGet package in .NET 8 #78647
    8.0.0
  • `QuicConnection.DisposeAsync` throws `OperationCanceledException` #78641
    8.0.0
  • Trying to send email to international email address #78640
  • Serious flaw that I believe can be exploited by people with no good intentions... #78639
  • Dereferencing before `null` checks #78634
  • The big XPS-issue thread #78629
  • DataRelation, possible incorrect order of arguments when calling `FindForeignKeyConstraint` #78628
  • how can we trim dll unused? #78633
  • GregorianCalendarHelper, suspicious `%` operator #78627
  • [wasm] Cannot installs `wasm-tools` for Wasm.Build.Tests on macOS/arm64 #78626
    8.0.0
  • MetricsEventSource, unreachable logging branch #78625
  • Investigate impact of inserted read barriers (.NET 8) #78624
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/nullabletypes/isinst_do/isinst_do.sh #78623
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/0099/AboveStackLimit/AboveStackLimit.sh #78622
  • Variant static interface dispatch crashes the runtime #78621
  • Test failure baseservices\\callconvs\\TestCallingConventions\\TestCallingConventions.cmd #78620
  • Non-deterministic behavior of Type.IsAssignableTo #78619
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.EventLogReaderTests.CastToEventLogRecord_NotNull #78618
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProviderMetadataTests.SourceDoesNotExist_Throws #78617

Closed

  • AccessViolationException in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates tests #78560
  • [wasm] add support for retrying debugger tests when chrome launch times out #76528
  • Vectorize IndexOfAny on more than 5 chars #68328
    8.0.0
  • Dead code not eliminated after constant folding/propagation #57033
    8.0.0
  • SPMI with `JitNoInline=1` asserts in instrumentation code #74718
    8.0.0
  • Regression: DeflateStream write empty array results in byte array '\u0003\0' #78636
  • System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.AppSettings is empty even when appsettings files are loaded #77461
  • Json Source Generator no code generated for Deserialize? #78602
  • JsonDeserializer.Deserialize throws "invalid start of a value" on a valid JSON #78611
  • Do not lock assembly to run `STARTUP_HOOKS` #78153
  • Azure Function Project's `func start` results in Could not load file or assembly 'System.Net.Http, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a'. The system cannot find the file specified. #78161
  • Make it unnecessary to add new versions of known distros into the RID graph #59803
    8.0.0
  • Support PROCESSOR_COUNT envvar on mono #60915
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add API to check if process had administrator privileges #68770
    8.0.0
  • OSX/Interop.libc.cs functions should be replaced by System.Native shim functions #70253
    Future
  • Chrome Debugger Tests timeout #78599
  • `Guid(ReadOnlySpan<Byte>)` could be optimized #78440
    Future
  • Inlined ReadOnlySpan<char> parameter lacks string-like optimizations #78359
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78668
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Regex.Escape #78667
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Uri #78666
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Fix netfx build for S.S.C.Xml nuget package #78665
    area-System.Security
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Xml #78664
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • Introduce a System.Formats.Tar area #78661
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in System.Net.Http #78660
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyInRange in StripBidiControlCharacters #78658
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Fix the other jmp.il after #78501 (more for #78579) #78656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a shared apicompat suppression file for CoreLib #78654
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][wasm] Disable AOTing methods which contain catch clauses insid… #78653
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Variables with same name in different scopes in async method #78651
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Performance improvements to vectorized Span.Reverse #78650
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for System.IO.Compression* #78645
    documentation, area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] propagate aborted startup to top most promise #78644
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] clean duplicated environment helpers #78643
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Bigger workitem timeout (for perf slow pipeline) #78632
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Keep FieldSeq in AssertionDesc #78616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • More robust handling of CERT_CONTEXT with multiple threads #78612
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Update failure message for helix retry #78655
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add IndexOfAnyValues #78093
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Avoid duplicate key lookups on replay #78597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add check for ALC in native hosting tests #78588
    area-Host
  • Disable a test on wasm until 78358 is fixed. #78637
    area-System.Xml
  • update System.CommandLine and adopt to breaking changes #78577
    area-System.Console
  • Pod Updates November 2022 #78603
    documentation, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Add System.Diagnostics.Process README.md #78525
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 8.0.0
  • Fix dependency graph viewer build and enable High DPI #78642
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update APICompat to be able to pass in multiple suppression files #78610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make optVNAssertionPropCurStmtVisitor post-order #78630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Implement fallback schema layout #78594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for standalone GC back compatibility #78484
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove enumerator allocation in for (HashSet, HashSet) comparisons in SetEquals and IsProperSupersetOf. #78613
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Use helpers in Guid's ROS<byte> constructor #78446
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Adds samples into `Microsoft.Extensions.*` readme files #78567
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fold "cns"[cns] for ROS<char> #78593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [6.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78670
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78669
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Fix to move to using GC pal within coreclr on Linux #78521
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #78426
    area-Interop-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [Release/7.0][PERF]Fix Mono Dotnet Generation #78413
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] More jiterpreter cleanup #78519
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix commit accounting for large pages #78564
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-consider, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 #78247
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey and List copy to Array #78558
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Clean-up `Microsoft.Win32.Registry` and remove the non-Windows code. #77996
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • avoid allocations in SendTo and Quic #78591
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/7.0] Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #78470
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Fix arithmetic overflow in Queue<T>'s MoveNext() #78600
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Removed range checks have ordered side effects (#78554) #78561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [PERF]Make mono dotnet pathing dynamic #78581
    area-Infrastructure
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Cache GenericTypeDefinition to improve perf #78288
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Use Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77847
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    NO-MERGE, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review, 8.0.0
  • Fix memory leaks reported by static analyzer #78492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Overlapped doesn't work on NativeAOT branch #491
  • Support x86 for NativeAOT #1471

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support some throwing operators via throw helper blocks #2100

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to mid dec #2099
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Zero-init locals on the shadow stack, simplify lowering code, allow STRUCT-typed PHIs #2096
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet publish` shows garbled characters when running on PMC on OS with Traditional Chinese language #29151
  • dotnet watch run ... is passing extra argument #29145
  • dotnet publish for Solution Filter fails with @ in path #29141

Closed

  • .Net 7 preview 7 is broken on linux arm64 via QEMU #27190
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc] Overtranslated string"dotnet workload search"occurs is displayed when running "dotnet workload list" #28417
  • Ability to update sdk (ie version 6.0.306 -> 6.0.403) and install new versions (7) from cli #28977
  • Access denied for NuGet package source while build dotnet/cli 3.1.300 Tag #11795
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET8.0 SDK installed, the default tfm should not be "net7.0" when creating project in CLI. #29080
  • Inconsistent handling of Microsoft.Extensions.* 6.0.0 and 6.0.1 dependencies #28856
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.2xx] Revert hot reload script injection response buffering #29152
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Introduce MSBuild task frontend for the Roslyn-based GenAPI #29146
    Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • Add switch to disable apphost pack restore #29137
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use CodeAnalysis.Simplification to expand and reduce generated subtrees. Add tests to cover CSharpFileBuilder and CSharpSyntaxWriter classes. #29058
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix EnableRuntimePackDownload logic #29138
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Don't stabilize package versions in main #29142
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid potential NRE (#29128) #29140
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Fix unhandled exception during test discovery on macOS #29083
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29132
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    Area-Common templates
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2049978 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29127
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog
  • Proposal: extend the set of things allowed in expression trees #2545
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086

  • Proposal: Sequence Expressions #377

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InsertMembers with method declarations to an interface declaration causes modifiers to be reset #65545
  • Use separate columns in sqlite to store key-info. #65540
  • SyntaxNodeExtensions.ReplaceNodes nullable ref annotation should allow null #65537
  • CS1998 proposed fix "remove async modifier" produces non-compiling code when returned type differs from the return Task's type parameter #65536
  • CS1998 proposed fix "Make method synchronous" should not be offered for overrides and interface implementations #65535
  • Embedded languages - support customizing tooltip #65531

Closed

  • Regular and generic methods with the same name in top-level statements cause compiler errors CS0308, CS0128 #65534
  • error VSTHRD010 errors are not displayed in the error list (17.4.0 RTM) #65304

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix null ref in add-import #65549
    Area-IDE
  • Support semantic tokens output in LSIF generator #65548
    Area-IDE, Community
  • WIP: Support fine-grained diagnostic tagging. #65547
    Area-IDE
  • Add more telemetry to Go To Def results from external sources #65544
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify how options are checked in the tagger. #65543
    Area-IDE
  • Only complete () if constructor is accessible #65542
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Merge pull request #63858 from CyrusNajmabadi/pullDiags" #65538
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Emit `ParamArrayAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65533
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix spelling mistake #65541
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add experimental formatting option to control placement of `=>` #65476
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [Port] Gracefully handle additional locations in DiagnosticData.Create #65532
    Area-Analyzers, OnDeckForServicing
  • Delete duplicate "SystemThreadingChannelsVersion" #65539
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix bug in partial solutions after a document was removed and added #65349
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix a NullReferenceException in Signature help #65372
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Update to latest version of protocol with new pull diagnostic types #65514
    Area-IDE
  • Don't complete parenthesis after 'new' if the type has nested types #63015
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic Snippets - Fix snippet priority in completion list #65103
    Area-IDE
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65500
    Area-Compilers
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65526
    Area-Compilers
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Create new vsix for x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic Snippets - try catch snippet #65101
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Expose constructor that allows for AnalysisOptions and a CancellationToken. #65051
    Area-Analyzers, api-ready-for-review
  • Fix MEF composition used for the LSIF generator #65512
    Area-IDE
  • Add additional cases whre 'use coalesce expression' can simplify code. #65371
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - else snippet #65178
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data"" #64892
    Area-IDE
  • Give a dedicated diagnostic for awaiting an `IAsyncEnumerable` #56885
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Improve consistency in our parser code. #65508
    Area-Compilers
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • [PERF] Do not force Compilation.GetDiagnostics for FixAll of syntax-only analyzers #65483
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Tenet-Performance

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Analyzer] Warn on ambiguous route patterns #45223
  • [Refactoring] Add back middlesware that are registered by WebApplication #45222
  • [Analyzer] Add missing services for registered middlewares #45221
  • [Refactoring] Move local authz policies to global authz policies #45220
  • [Refactoring] Recommend using `AddAuthorizationBuilder` to enable authz and configure policies #45219
  • [Analyzer] Warn on inconsistent constraints between route params and types #45218
  • [Codefixer] Recommend using `TypedResults` over using `Results` #45217
  • Lack of button types in header of QuickGrid #45216
  • Kestrel stops listening/responding to requests after some time (only after updating to .NET 7.0) #45215
  • API's for creating custom WebSocket server's without dealing with transport code. Bedrock? #45214
  • Revisit hot reload browser refresh script injection #45213
  • W3C cookies only logged when other "RequestHeader" fields are logged. #45212
  • Add support to `dotnet dev-certs` for managing HTTPS certs in WSL #45208
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Enable customization of responce_type for OAuth Authentication #45207
  • Blazor WASM net::ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #45199

Closed

  • Setup Stress Testing infrastructure for Blazor Server #20387
    8.0-MQ
  • Not updating js module after route change #45194
  • Create an analyzer to help verify and fix endpoint metadata of minimal APIs #34543
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor server renders twice resulting in static HTML animation showing twice #39740
    Backlog
  • ASP .NET CORE Custom Middleware #45080
  • Blazor Custom Element with ChildContent and Parameters #45183
  • Website Import - blazor (wasm) web view not displayed correctly #45195
    Discussions
  • Blazor WASM Not Downloading Azure Blob SAS URL #45209
  • [EPIC] Revisiting HTTPS defaults in ASP.NET Core #41990
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor @bind:set produces code that doesn't compile in .NET 7 #45200
  • Upgrading nuget package "Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation" from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 causes unwanted errors to be shown in api logging. #45149
  • Can't pass `IJSObjectReference` in calls from JS to .NET #26049
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Full page flash when loading a prerendered page that uses lazy loading #25731
    .NET 8 Planning
  • "Empty" errors in MVC Controller #45178
  • Url.Action doesn't include action name when there are more parameters #24480
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WASM stuck in infinite Http Request Loop #45032

PullRequests

Created

  • Update @types/Webpack #45211
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Add more StringSyntaxAttrbute syntaxes #44663
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Use TryAddSingleton for PolicyCache #45202
    area-security, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Support `sub` as `ExternalLoginInfo.ProviderKey` #45198
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014 #45127
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2050368 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • [Api Controllers] Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45173
    area-web-frameworks
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add support for comment syntax to route detector #45185
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DumpMT disabled in SOS.OtherCommands for .NET 7.0+ #3516
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix test running on macOS devices #3515
    auto-merge
  • Disable internal caps for codeql #3518

Updated

  • Add the ALC to `DumpMT` #3508

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebView on iOS using Navigating event fails with obj exception #11544
  • UISwitch doesn't toggle the first time if you have VoiceOver enabled #11543
    Backlog
  • SearchBar does not unfocus and hide keyboard on iOS #11542
  • [MAUI Blazor] Decide whether to support host pages located outside the content directory root #11541
  • Pinned Informational Issue #11540
  • .net maui android app not working when deployed to play store when using firebase nuget packages #11538
  • MSAL missing_entitlements with local iPhone device #11536
  • Handler PlatformView width issue (Android) #11535
  • Android app works in Debug but crashes in Release. #11534
  • [xamlc] ~20% of time spent in `XmlTypeExtensions.GetTypeReference()` #11533
    .NET 8 Planning
  • iOS map clicked event fires when tap on pin #11532
  • Fix MultiPageFragmentStateAdapter so it doesn't use `GetHashCode` for `GetItemId` #11529
    Backlog
  • Rework LogicalChildren on Element to better represent visual vs logical children #11528
    Backlog
  • FileSavePicker throws "Invalid window handle" error #11527
  • ScrollView ScrollY position does not updated properly when scroll using ScrollToAsync() at Run time (Windows) #11526
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Startup Crash Specific to iOS 12 and .Net 7 #11525
  • Flyout items can vanish when arrowing down through a flyout. #11522
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • App Shell tab icon change using Trigger cause rearrangement issue in Android , Works in IOS. #11520
    Backlog
  • CarouselView inside CollectionView throws Java.Lang.RuntimeException: 'Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap' #11519
    Backlog
  • Unpackaged app compilation fail due to space in profile name #11518
  • File is not a database on iphone xr #11517
    Backlog
  • Embedding .NET MAUI in a native WinUI 3 App doesn't work as expected - Not even launching #11516
    Backlog
  • problem when i run the app #11515

Closed

  • .Net 7 Android Maui FlayoutPage Crashes on Release Mode When Enable Trimming Selected #11514
  • Build of MAUI app fails if NuGet package contains references #11364
    Backlog
  • Flyout items can vanish when arrowing down through a flyout #8834
  • Unable to set Pane1Length or Pane2Length in XAML on TwoPaneView #11240
    Backlog
  • Remove calls to Console.WriteLine to decrease app size #11405
    Backlog
  • iOS/macOS Images not cropped inside of a Frame #6580
    Backlog
  • Allow custom/localized text for TabBar "More"-button #11521
    Backlog
  • iOS ScrollView inside VerticalStackLayout Crashes with infinite height measurement #11017
    Backlog
  • ScrollView frozen in iOS when data is loaded async #9209
  • Shell Navigation GoToAsync exception on iOS #11503
  • [Android] Keyboard is not dismissed after tapping "Enter" #10858
    Backlog
  • Localization not work under iOS and Mac arm64 #11474
  • Changing ApplicationDisplayVersion in .NET MAUI project causes problems #11464

PullRequests

Created

  • Add .NET 7 announcement #11539
  • [Android] Fix issue correctly updating WrapperView content visibility #11531
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    area/TabbedPage

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Remove calls to Console.WriteLine to decrease app size #11437
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11389
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [foldable] add TypeConverter to Pane1Length/Pane2Length properties #11269
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-twopaneview
  • Clean up the files in the xml-docs artifacts #11257
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix iOS/macOS Images not cropped inside of a Frame #6580 #11352
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [Build] Clean up provisioning script #11523
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Ensure that UIScrollView ContentSize is set #11175
    area/layout 🔲, layout-scrollview
  • [net7.0] [iOS/macOS] Fix issue updating the Frame HasShadow property #11488
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • CodeQL only on main/non-public builds #11273
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #10948
    area/a11y, area/gestures
  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Possible fix for issue #10960 #11361
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11390
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #11314
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.221109.1 to 1.2.221116.1 #11469
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Using local function to fix multi-thread issues #11497
    area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Fix shadow visibility on Windows #10996
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Use darc to get feeds for dependencies of build #11487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Review our LEFT vs. INNER join behavior for Include #29645
  • Temporal table - TemporalAsOf() - nested children entities on navigation property not loaded #29644
  • Deleting a child entity instance when the parent entity uses DeleteUsingStoredProcedure fails with a NullReferenceException. #29643
  • Performance regression in migrations in Entity Framework Core 7 #29642
  • Issue Running EF Core Bundle in DevOps Pipeline #29641
  • Foreign key {'X'} on entity type {T} cannot have a required dependent end since it is not unique. #29640
  • GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #29638
  • EF Core 7 InMemory database - An issue during invoking method AddRange/UpdateRange with strongly typed ids #29636
  • DbContext scaffold missing IndexerProperty for M2M relation after moving to EF Core 7 #29634
  • Error during EnsureCreate on sqlite db with json columns #29632
  • Why is FromSqlRaw forbidden for TPC if I query on the derived entity #29631
  • SQLite Error 11: database disk image is malformed #29630

Closed

  • Idempotent migration script not working on EFCore7.0 for AlterColumn when nullable changed from true to false #29530
  • [Inheritance] INSERT derived class as base class #29637
  • entityframeworkcore 7.0.0 is not compatible with netstandard2.1 #29639
  • Batched query breaks after upgrade to 7.0 - The UPDATE statement conflicted with the FOREIGN KEY constraint #29562

PullRequests

Created

  • SQLite type mapping should not be returned without converter when CLR type does not match #29633

Merged

  • Fix making column required on SQL Server with idempotent migrations #29619
  • C# modernization/cleanup in database model factories #29622

Updated

  • Modernize type checking in model differ #28381
